org.battlenight.api

Interface BattleAPI


  • public interface BattleAPI
    Represents the API for accessing BattleNight singletons.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CommandManager getCommandManager()
      Gets the current CommandManager singleton.
      Configuration getConfiguration()
      Gets the current Configuration singleton.
      GameTypeManager getGameTypeManager()
      Gets the current GameTypeManager singleton.
      Lobby getLobby()
      Gets the current Lobby singleton.
      Messenger getMessenger()
      Gets the current Messenger singleton.
      void reload()
      Soft reloads the BattleNight singletons.
